name: Pack 256
description:
Oh no! You've been separated from your Cub Scout Pack #256. You have no weapons or tools, only your lantern and wits. You must climb up 5 levels of the deep cave you fell into to make it back to your troop.

WASD / Arrows to move

Avoid the red-glowing enemies

Find the blue-glowing ladder to climb to the next floor

Find 3 badges on each floor to fill your sash!

Each floor is randomly generated. This game was made for the Quarantine Jam! Please let me know how I can improve in the comments!
